person.persName: Leonard Edelen (Marion County, Kentucky, hatter and merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, hatter and merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Bruce Edelen. Father of Mary C. Edelen, James H. Edelen, Lucinda Edelen,Leonard Edelen, Robert Hagin Edelen, and George T. Edelen. Engaged in manufacturing and/or trades in 1840. Hatter in Marion County in 1850. Employed Thomas H. Brown as a hatter in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860. Employed his son, Leonard Edelen, as a clerk in 1860.
